body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation      The city of Redding is located 8 miles to the east and is served by Amtrak, Greyhound and the Redding Airport. Public transportation from Redding to Whiskeytown is not available, however rental cars are available at the airport and in town.
title: Whiskeytown National Recreation Area: Public Transportation
